mapper.select: SELECT T1.QUEST_NO, T1.QUEST_SEQ, T1.QUEST_CONTENT, C1, C2, C3, C4, C5 FROM TB_QUEST AS T1 LEFT JOIN TB_CHOICE AS T2 ON T1.QUEST_NO = T2.QUEST_NO WHERE ROUND_NO = #{roundNo} AND USE_F = 'Y';

SELECT T1.QUEST_NO, T1.QUEST_SEQ, T1.QUEST_CONTENT, T3.REG_USER, C1, C2, C3, C4, C5 FROM TB_QUEST AS T1 INNER JOIN TB_CHOICE AS T2 ON T1.QUEST_NO = T2.QUEST_NO INNER JOIN TB_ROUND AS T3 ON T1.ROUND_NO = T3.ROUND_NO WHERE T1.QUEST_NO = #{questNo} AND T1.USE_F = 'Y'

SELECT T4.TEST_NAME, T3.ROUND_NAME, T2.QUEST_SEQ, T2.QUEST_NO, T1.REG_TIME FROM ( SELECT USER_ID, TARGET_ID, REG_TIME FROM TB_LOG WHERE ACTION = 'SOLVED' GROUP BY USER_ID, TARGET_ID ORDER BY REG_TIME ) AS T1 INNER JOIN tb_quest AS T2 ON TARGET_ID = QUEST_NO INNER JOIN tb_round AS T3 ON T3.ROUND_NO = T2.ROUND_NO INNER JOIN tb_test AS T4 ON T4.TEST_NO = T3.TEST_NO WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT T2.TEST_NAME, T1.ROUND_NAME, T1.ROUND_NO, T1.REG_TIME FROM TB_ROUND AS T1 INNER JOIN TB_TEST AS T2 ON T2.TEST_NO = T1.TEST_NO WHERE REG_USER = #{userId} AND T1.USE_F = 'Y'

SELECT T1.TEST_NAME, T2.ROUND_NAME,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_quest AS T4 WHERE T4.ROUND_NO = T2.ROUND_NO ) AS COUNT FROM tb_test AS T1 INNER JOIN tb_round AS T2 ON T2.TEST_NO = T1.TEST_NO INNER JOIN tb_quest AS T3 ON T3.ROUND_NO = T2.ROUND_NO WHERE T3.QUEST_NO = #{questNo}

SELECT * FROM tb_quest AS T1 INNER JOIN tb_round AS T2 ON T1.ROUND_NO = T2.ROUND_NO WHERE T1.ROUND_NO = ( SELECT ROUND_NO FROM tb_quest WHERE QUEST_NO = #{questNo} ) AND T1.QUEST_NO > #{questNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT T1.QUEST_NO FROM TB_QUEST AS T1 INNER JOIN
SELECT #{answer.questNo} AS QUEST_NO, #{answer.answer} AS ANSWER AS T2 ON T1.QUEST_NO = T2.QUEST_NO AND T1.ANSWER = T2.ANSWER
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ARTICLE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE NO = #{no}
